answers.answer: It can be normal; baby is putting a lot of pressure in there and sometimes things get squished and sore. However, rib pain is one of those things you want to give your doctor a call about because it can be related to preeclampsia. So I'd give them a call and see if they feel you should be seen, BUT it's probably fine and just normal growing pains. :)
It's normal, because your uterus is pressed up against your ribs . Same happened to me

question: Hello im 36 weeks and does anybodys ribs feel sore? Is it because my baby may be big or its normal?
title: in pain
